<div class="exam__box">
    <div class="count_area">
    <span class="count">0</span>
    </div>
    <div class="btn_area">
        <button type="button" id="button01"><span>Button</span></button>
    </div>
</div>
(function($, win, doc) {
    'use strict';

    var btn = $('#btn_count');
    
    function countFunc () {
        var count = 0;
        return ++count;
    };

    btn.on('click', function () {
        $('.count').html(countFunc());
    });

})(jQuery, window, document);
